revised_title: Raman Spectra of Deuterium-Substituted Acetic Acids
tldr: The authors investigated the Raman spectra of deuterium-substituted acetic acids, including trideuteracetic deuteracid and acetic deuteracid. They compared the spectra with that of acetic acid and found differences due to isotopic effects. This study helped in assigning frequencies and understanding the influence of isotopic substitution on physical properties of substances.
